segments.text: Hello , sir . Have you anything to declare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is my first tourism . I don't know what should be declared .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Please open your luggage , and I'll tell you what you should declare .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should declare the camera and the film . Do you have alcohol ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have got some special local product , I want to take them for my friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many bottles have you got with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . According to the regulations , a passenger can only take two bottles on to the aircraft . So you cannot take so many .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What shall I do with my two more bottles ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You may give them to your friends who come to see you off . This is the Customs Declaration Form . Please fill in it . And then you can go through the other formalities . Be sure to keep the form safe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , thank you , see you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: See you . Have a good journey .
segments.speaker: S1
